scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This is the original, partial typescript as submitted to Harold Strauss according to correspondence circa September 1939 (Box 30, Folder 1). The pages are ordered exactly as they were found in the original folder kept by HSA. On the backs of the pages are hand-written notes regarding Between the Flowers, but it is difficult to tell if it is a new draft.
